phrases: dou ka please can you keep my se cret?
mu ga mu chuu da that is all right
Please, please can you keep my secret?
I wonder how do I look in it.
What will happen from now, I wonder?
Because what we see is not everything.
I am losing myself but that is all right.
I will now try not to waver.
I want to be true to my heart.
But even I have a secret or two.
That I want to keep to myself.
That is why my secret makes my heart aches slightly.
Everything that is reflected by your eyes,
is it all just an illusion?
as you melt away in this entangling love
Take a look at the reason we are joined together
Let us cling on to each other from our sadness
Is not it fine just like that?
It will be an unadorned beauty
That no matter where we are,
You are really sly Ayuzawa, Usui you idiot!
You are really sly Ayuzawa, Usui you idiot!
Should not the guy eat instead...?
Do not drag me down in the next event, okay?
You are having fun all the while, are not you?!
These costumes are precious, so be careful not to get them dirty
Continuing from last episode, we are still at Yumesaki High's Cultural Festival.
This place is especially crowded; let us go somewhere else.
I came here because I was worried about Sakura.
We got separated, but it will be pointless if I go back now.
Maybe someone from our school is here as well!
I guess I will kill time with Usui'til the live performance is over.
How did you manage to get all those?!
For some reason, the passersby gave them to me.
They told me to try them out.
What do you mean by'some reason'?!
Damn, I am getting surrounded again.
I do not know what is happening, but...
Do not make their flowers bloom again.
What kind of magic did you pull?
I do not think that is the right word...
What is the point of doing that?!
Why not try some food here?
Did you read into my mind again?!
What is with that superhuman power?!
You are thinking of the same things as I am, eh?
I cannot be sitting here idly in a festival!
I tried most of the food here already.
Let us try out the events next!
Let us see how'ancient' the designs are!
Did you win the game console that you wanted?
I won it with only a single postcard!
There is no lucky draw club here, I guess.
It is an unusual club, after all.
Let us eat some steamed buns.
Kanou, let us get some fried stuff!
Damn, I am still feeling hot.
We have got an event just right for the both of you!
Test out the strength of your relationship!
Follow the designated course and clear the challenges along the way.
You will be eliminated if you fail even once!
A super premium ticket to the post-festival event!
You must not let go of your partner's hand during the game.
Well then, will you be able to overcome the trials ahead together?
Dare to take up the challenge?
I want to see for myself if a romance between us is really impossible.
A romance between the two of you cannot happen.
You are still thinking about that-
Let us face this obstacle together,'kay?
Geez, this is such a waste of money.
We can enjoy a lot of things just for 500 yen!
It is a bargain, you know?
Oh yeah, take off your ribbon.
This is the proof of participation and it has to be kept visible at all times.
I am supposed to wear that?
Well, it looks good on you.
They say it is fine to bring it back with you.
It is not such a waste after all, is it?
It is fine to enjoy yourself once in a while.
You will get that frown embedded on your face if you always have it on.
That is not for you to say, idiot.
Next up is Kamiyama and Oono's comedic skit.
Is that supposed to be my fault?!
I have 2 hours to lecture you then.
Why are you willing to wait so long for this?
I would rather be with Misaki and go back first.
What is with this course of events?
Why am I holding hands with Usui in this game?
I am supposed to be with Sakura and Shizuko!
How did it turn out like this?!
We have to clear this within 10 minutes.
Your face is pissing me off!
You are not supposed to run on the corridors, right?
I am surprised we did not meet anyone we know.
What is this sound I am hearing...?
Here, this is my proof of participation.
I would have taken only a minute to get here.
I would have done it in 30 seconds!
Please explain the game to us.
It will be simple for two people.
Only one of you will do the eating.
I am feeling some hostility from behind...
The other couples barely cleared this stage!
Good luck, for the sake of your girl!
Let us decide using rock, paper, scissors.
What, you think that I am unable to finish this?
Fine, I will finish everything right to the last drop of soup!
Sorry, can I let go of his hand for this game?
I will have to eat with my left then.
This is where I come in.
I will feed you, so just enjoy the food.
Hurry up, or you will not be able to finish within 10 minutes.
It is the girl who is doing the eating!
Want me to blow on it?
It is fine as it is!
It will be just what he wants if I feel embarrassed here!
Hey, it is getting crazy over there!
A couple's duking it out at godly speed!
Hey, that couple did something amazing again!
The next game was Class 3-2's card game, right?
Toran, who was unbeatable in speed games,
lost to them at the speed of light!
Usually it will be hard to win using the hand you are not used to.
I have won, but I cannot seem to control my strength...
Trying to give an excuse since you are naturally a right-hander?
I am just not in top form!
First, find a balloon marked with the word Lucky.
Then, burst it, and answer the questions on the paper that is inside it.
We are attracting quite a lot of attention...
We stood out too much, I guess.
Maybe it is about time to tell her straight...
Let us race to see who finds the balloon first.
There is a time limit, you know?!
I am against him from the start.
He is arrogant, and his looks are outrageous as well.
Just what do you see in him?!
I am getting more and more annoyed waiting in this crowd!
I should have put it in a nicer way.
I cannot explain it well, too.
He is cool, and I admire him for how he chases after his dreams.
The feeling of'love' overflows from somewhere else.
Even if people are against it and you know you cannot make the cut,
once you realize this feeling, it is unstoppable.
This is a special invitation for tonight's post-festival event.
Please enjoy it to the end!
Why is Misa-chan taking the day off?
She should have asked me to go along with her.
There is no way that will happen, you perv.
My, my, I see you are relaxing comfortably here.
Yeah, to the point of becoming blobs.
You cannot distinguish between us now.
We are not even humans anymore.
I am glad that you are relaxing that much over here.
Please take your time and enjoy yourselves.
I am sorry for being late, Manager.
Me too, I had some unfinished business to attend to.
It is fine, I am glad you both came to help.
Hey, how are we going to drink this?
We cannot drink in this form...
You were having fun teasing me, were not you?
Was I the only one having fun?
Well, I had fun as well.
It got delayed quite a while.
The nearer it is to the stage, the more crowded it is.
That is why we should meet up with them after it ends.
I thought it would be better to get closer to them.
Could it be that you almost got separated from me?
Do you want to hold my hand, just like before?
You cannot meet up with us?
Geez, I will do the explaining!
We are going to stroll around the festival grounds with UxMishi.
Geez, I thought some girls chased after me again.
They wanted to take a look around without being noticed, so they asked us along.
I will call you back later.
What is wrong, glaring at me like that?
Do not worry, I am not the least bit interested in you.
I do not want to get scolded like that again.
Is it wrong for me to invite her for a stroll?
You know she would not refuse, so you are just using her, right?
To tell you the truth, I do not trust you at all.
But Sakura told me you have changed, so I came here to see for myself.
Stop using that glare on me!
I am sorry, but this is just how I look.
I am staring hard to spot where you might have changed.
Kuuga, I brought these for you today!
She is the only one who sees me for who I am.
Just go play along with your boyfriend and leave us alone!
He is just a perverted alien stalker!
Wait, do not tell me he is still enduring it?
You are not only clueless, but strict and violent as well.
I would ditch you already if I were him.
I would not want to be with you either!
It was packed with people, so I had to wait.
Well, I have completed what I came here to do...
Huh, you are not acting like your usual self.
It is not up to me to decide anyway.
Well, since we are done already, shall we head back?
I want to stay on til' it ends...
I just felt like inviting you!
I will just go there alone!
We cleared the trial and got this special invitation anyway.
So this is what they meant by special service...
Create your own special memories in this special uniform on this special night!
Heard they are going to have fireworks in this event.
Since we are here already, let us watch that.
Good, this place seems to have the best view of the fireworks.
Is it fine to enter just like this?
It is fine as long as we do not mess it up.
Watching it from the campfire site might be better.
That is not what I meant...
Are you... enduring a lot of things just for me?
Do you want me to say it out?
I will tell you if you answer my question.
Why are you that bothered by me?
I do not know it myself, even if you ask me.
You always lie at times like this.
Why are you blushing so hard now?
I do not get it at all!
You are a pervert who annoys me all the time.
You are always running ahead of me and teasing me.
I would not have realized it if not for that game!
I wanted to join hands with you since a long time ago!
One moment you are sexually harassing me, and then gone the next...
Why is my heart beating so fast?
Why do I feel lonely when you leave me?
You idiot, why do you always tease me?
Just how much more are you going to make me endure?
I wanted to see your interesting expressions, that is why I teased you.
Your sudden smiles always surprise me.
They are interesting, but dangerous enough to make my heart race.
I have been enduring a lot of things, and I cannot phrase it short.
This is what is on my mind right now.
I forgot we need aprons for today's lesson!
Here is an apron I won from a postcard draw!
Someone will be happy if you wear this!
It is the quiet tea time before opening hours
Satsuki, I got thrown out again so I will be counting on you!
He is my rival, after all!
I will definitely make her look at me!
Do not eat bread crusts on your way to school!
It is too heavy for you, Yukimura.
When the rain stopped after school
Look, my world is getting stained
Yes, it is stained with your color
A warm light embraces you gently
Just like the puddle after the rain
Let the flowers of your dream bloom
Because I will always be at your side
The flowers of my dream are all blooming
Because you will always be at my side
As the sky turns madder red
It is time for that sad season again
to the time when I first met you
My heart is beating so madly
Even now, it is still tightening up
I do not want to lose this precious memory
I do not want to say goodbye for a second time
Thank you for your support - FFFPeeps
Thank you for your support - FFFPeeps
